author: Adam Carey ACarey@RN-T.com
title: Three People Charged With Child Truancy | Crime | northwestgeorgianews.com
text:
A pair of Floyd County parents and another woman are all charged with child truancy for allowing their children numerous unexcused absences from school, reports state.
According to Floyd County Jail reports:
